text: Abdool Raouf Bundhun (born 14 January 1937)Profile of Abdool Raouf Bundhun was Vice President of Mauritius from 2002 to 2007. He was elected by National Assembly of Mauritius on 25 February 2002 for a term of five years. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Mauritian politicians Category:Vice presidents
title: Raouf Bundhun
